content: निचुलः {@--1@} A kind of reed. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a poet and friend of Kālidāsa; स्थानादस्मात् सरसनिचुलादुत्पतोदङ्मुखः खं <ls>Me. 14</ls> (where <ls>Malli.</ls> observes: --निचुलो नाम मह कविः कालिदासस्य सहाध्यायः; but this explanation is very doubtful). {@--3@} An upper garment, cover <ab>cf.</ab> निचोल. {@--4@} The tree called हिज्जल, (Barringtonia Acutangula).
